note:
Retired IT/Project Manager. MSc in Computing, plus a looonng list of certs.

Adopted grandad to 4 children. Threaten them at your peril.

I like to travel both in UK and further afield. Used to walk / backpack a lot and spent probably more than a year camping; was a bit of an Action Man in my youth.

Currently living in Somerset, SW England.

Politically very active; may well be standing in an area near you in 2023. Centrist and proud of it.
